bean.description: 根据购物车行查询包装信息.

constructor-arg.value:
select orderLinePackageInfo.id as orderLinePackageInfoId, orderLinePackageInfo.PACKAGEINFO_ID as packageInfoId, orderLinePackageInfo.ORDERLINE_ID as orderLineId,
packageInfo.type as type, packageInfo.total as total, packageInfo.FEATURE_INFO as featureInfo, packageInfo.EXTEND_INFO as extendInfo
from T_SO_ORDERLINE_PACKAGE_INFO orderLinePackageInfo join T_SO_ORDERLINE orderLine on orderLine.id = orderLinePackageInfo.ORDERLINE_ID join T_PI_PACKAGE_INFO packageInfo on packageInfo.id = orderLinePackageInfo.PACKAGEINFO_ID
where orderLinePackageInfo.ORDERLINE_ID in ( #foreach($orderLineId in $orderLineIdList ) $orderLineId, #end -1)
